overview: After a cop dies, his shield goes back on duty.  They call it a "dead badge" - a way to honor a fallen officer. Badge #2424 used to belong to Many Torres - a cop who died of a heroin O.D.  Now it belongs to Dan Sampson... and it's haunting him.
tagline: A clean cop. A corrupt precinct.  The bad blood is about to boil.
title: Dead Badge
